requirements.title: User Registration
requirements.description: Allow users to create a new account in the system.

acceptance_criteria.then: Allow users to create a new account in the system.

requirements.original_intent: Users can register, log in, reset their password, and update their profile.

requirements.title: User Registration
requirements.description:
Actor: User

Action: Register an account

System Behavior: The system accepts user registration details and creates an account.

Expected Outcome: A new user account is created successfully.

Observable Result: The user receives a confirmation message upon successful registration.

acceptance_criteria.given: A user provides valid registration details
acceptance_criteria.when: The user submits the registration form
acceptance_criteria.then: The system creates a new user account and displays a confirmation message.

gaps: Specific validation rules for registration details are not defined.
Required fields for registration are not specified.
ambiguities: Specific validation rules for registration details are not defined.
Required fields for registration are not specified.
requirements.original_intent: Users can register, log in, reset their password, and update their profile.

requirements.title: User Login
requirements.description: Allow users to log into their existing accounts.

acceptance_criteria.then: Allow users to log into their existing accounts.

requirements.original_intent: Users can register, log in, reset their password, and update their profile.

requirements.title: User Login
requirements.description:
Actor: User

Action: Log in to the system

System Behavior: The system authenticates the user based on provided credentials.

Expected Outcome: The user gains access to their account.

Observable Result: The user is redirected to their dashboard upon successful login.

acceptance_criteria.given: A user provides valid login credentials
acceptance_criteria.when: The user submits the login form
acceptance_criteria.then: The system authenticates the user and redirects them to their dashboard.

gaps: Specific error messages for failed login attempts are not defined.
The authentication method (e.g., password, two-factor) is not specified.
ambiguities: Specific error messages for failed login attempts are not defined.
The authentication method (e.g., password, two-factor) is not specified.
requirements.original_intent: Users can register, log in, reset their password, and update their profile.

requirements.title: Password Reset
requirements.description: Allow users to reset their passwords if forgotten.

acceptance_criteria.then: Allow users to reset their passwords if forgotten.

requirements.original_intent: Users can register, log in, reset their password, and update their profile.

requirements.title: Password Reset
requirements.description:
Actor: User

Action: Request a password reset

System Behavior: The system sends a password reset link to the user's registered email.

Expected Outcome: The user receives an email with instructions to reset their password.

Observable Result: The user receives a confirmation message indicating that the reset link has been sent.

acceptance_criteria.given: A user requests a password reset
acceptance_criteria.when: The user submits their email address
acceptance_criteria.then: The system sends a password reset link to the provided email address.

gaps: The process for verifying the user's identity before sending the reset link is not defined.
ambiguities: The process for verifying the user's identity before sending the reset link is not defined.
requirements.original_intent: Users can register, log in, reset their password, and update their profile.

requirements.title: Profile Update
requirements.description: Allow users to update their profile information.

acceptance_criteria.then: Allow users to update their profile information.

requirements.original_intent: Users can register, log in, reset their password, and update their profile.

requirements.title: Profile Update
requirements.description:
Actor: User

Action: Update profile information

System Behavior: The system allows users to modify their profile details.

Expected Outcome: The user's profile information is updated successfully.

Observable Result: The user receives a confirmation message upon successful profile update.

acceptance_criteria.given: A user provides updated profile information
acceptance_criteria.when: The user submits the profile update form
acceptance_criteria.then: The system updates the user's profile and displays a confirmation message.

gaps: Specific fields that can be updated in the profile are not defined.
Validation rules for profile updates are not specified.
ambiguities: Specific fields that can be updated in the profile are not defined.
Validation rules for profile updates are not specified.
